analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/40/0xea8065ecdaa360a6190f9ab0091fe74b6ecb3f48.sol:
	Contract ADZbuzzCommunityToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/40/0xea8065ecdaa360a6190f9ab0091fe74b6ecb3f48.sol#219-220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/40/0xea8065ecdaa360a6190f9ab0091fe74b6ecb3f48.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/40/0xea8065ecdaa360a6190f9ab0091fe74b6ecb3f48.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/40/0xea8065ecdaa360a6190f9ab0091fe74b6ecb3f48.sol#90) is not in mixedCase
